description: Predict whether genes with spaceflight responses in PBMC immune cells (9 cell types) also show DE in skin tissue. Tests cross-tissue conservation of spaceflight molecular signatures within the I4 mission.
ground_truth_source: P03 Supplementary Data 15 (Conserved DEGs across I4 tissues)

input_spec.features: 9 PBMC cell-type fold changes (CD4_T, CD8_T, other_T, B, NK, CD14_Mono, CD16_Mono, DC, other)

notes: Unique I4 question: do immune cell responses predict skin tissue responses?
Uses processed conserved DEG data from P03 that was previously untasked
